website_summaries.verdict: A budget option to upgrade a sound system without spending more money on extra infotainment features.
pros: Large control knobs and buttons to change the radio without looking while driving
Comes with a small remote control for passenger use
Detachable face plate for easy installation and maintenance
cons: Made more for marine and motorsports use, so may not work for some vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Turd
customer_reviews.text: Good unit for the price range. Bluetooth hooks up easily and range is decent. But this turd of a receiver quit working after only hours of use, not abused, not gotten wet as it is on my boat. Quit sending signal to all speaker channels. Amazon made it right and refunded my money, (thanks amazon) but this is most certainly a turd. I guess I should have kept the working cassette tape player that my boat used to have as it was working fine being more than 15yrs old..
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: The directions were hard to follow and the unit stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: The directions were hard to follow and the unit stopped working after two weeks. I called customer service and each time I called, they had a different test to apply. Nothing worked and JVC would not sent me a new one.They expected me to pay for shipping the unit to a service center in New York. Now it is too late to sent the unit back to Amazon. Now I'm stuck. The JVC service crew are a joke. Stay away from JVC.
customer_reviews.author: Gail S. Mazzei

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Was a pretty good unit while it lasted. The unit has been installed for 55 clock hours and now it produces no sound. Factory reset procedures don’t work. JVC wants me to bench test before sending it back. No thanks, if I have to pull the harness out of a fresh total vehicle rewire I’ll replace it with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Morris J.

customer_reviews.title: the neighbors can hear it as good as I can
customer_reviews.text: Put this unit in my pool house with a pair of outdoor Infinity & Jenson speakers No need for an amp, the neighbors can hear it as good as I can!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 minutes, then fried.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for all of 2 minutes, then NOTHING. Had 3 service people check out the install; all stated the receiver itself was faulty- NOT the install/wiring/etc! Waste of time and money as now I have to uninstall and go thru insurance BS.
customer_reviews.author: G. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like the customization of this stereo. Love the Bluetooth feature. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID MAJORS

customer_reviews.title: Alot of sound adjustment
customer_reviews.text: It has a bright screen easily seen with sunlight reflection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: People said No it's fine, right answer is Yes it dims pretty much
customer_reviews.text: I asked others here if the display was dimmer when viewed from an up angle (like your eyes below the unit looking at 30° up angle). People said No it's fine, right answer is Yes it dims pretty much. I thought the white back-light would help, nope. Returned it an hour after UPS truck dropped it off.
customer_reviews.author: JeeperDon

customer_reviews.title: (Disappointed.)  Update. A little over a year old. Not working. Probably going to checkout another Brand of Radio.
customer_reviews.text: Spent 4 hours installing on my motorcycle,only to have the CD player not working . will follow up with a review after i see how JVC handles it. Follow up. JVC said to have Amazon handle it. Thanks to Amazon i'm getting another radio. Let you know how the next one works. Update. Replacement radio installed. Sounds Great. More features then expected. Would recommend to anyone. Only gave a 4 rating because of problem with first radio.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Wasted of money
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months it stop sending output to the amp
customer_reviews.author: TTran

customer_reviews.title: A+++ even not using an amplifier
customer_reviews.text: Nice marine head unit. Outputs are adjustable independently. Front speaker size frq. Slope and dB. Then rear size frq slope and dB. Cross over selection if great as well. With 3 sets of preouts. Current hooked to to 5 inch and two 6x9s the p to two wake tower speakers. Good clean and clear. Wonderful replacement. Cleaner louder and and more options the my marine Kenwood. Definitely more RMS watts for your 4 channel outputs. Love the USB and Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Dont get it wet.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a marine stereo for my samurai since it gets wet inside pretty often. Worked fine until it the first time it got a little wet. My regular walmart jvc held up better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: JVC KDR97MBS Compatible with iPod & Android CD Receiver with Bluetooth
product_meta.description: Voice Recognition Dialing, Siri Eyes Free Mode for iPod/iPhone, 2 Phones Full-Time Connection, Phone Book Access Profile (PBAP), Auto Pairing for iPhone / Android, Apple iTunes Radio / Pandora / iHeartRadio Control (iPhone via USB, Android via Bluetooth), SiriusXM Ready, Front USB Input with 1.5A Charging*, Front AUX Input, iPhone/iPodMusicPlaybackviaUSB, Music Playback through USB for Android , Media Playback (MP3/WMA...CD/USB) (WAV...USB) (FLAC...USB), K2 Technology, Tuner with RBDS and Radio Time, MOS-FET 50W x 4 Power Output (22W RMS x 4), 13-Band Graphic EQ and Easy Control 8 Preset EQ, Source Link EQ, Loudness Control(Off/Low/High) + Bass Boost Control, 4.0V Pre-Output Terminals (Front + Rear + Subwoofer), High-Pass + Low-Pass Filter, Subwoofer Level Control, 1-Zone Variable Color Illumination, Separated Brightness Control with Auto Dimmer, Steering Wheel and Marine Remote Ready, Optional Wireless Remote Control Ready, Detachable Face Panel, English or Spanish Menu

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars18 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
